mapper.insert: insert into member(company_id, num, name, phone_number, email, grade, sex, profession, department) values (#{companyId},#{num},#{name},#{phoneNumber},#{email},#{grade},#{sex},#{profession},#{department});
mapper.delete: delete from member where company_id = #{companyId} and num = #{num};

delete from member where company_id =#{companyId} num in
#{item}
mapper.select: select count(num) from member where company_id = #{companyId};

select company_id, num, name, phone_number, email, grade, sex, profession, department from member where 1 = 1
and member.company_id like '%${member.companyId}%'
and member.num like '%${member.num}%'
and member.name like '%${member.name}%'
and member.phone_number like '%${member.phoneNumber}%'
and member.email like '%${member.email}%'
and member.grade like '%${member.grade}%'
and member.sex like '%${member.sex}%'
and member.profession like '%${member.profession}%'
and member.department like '%${member.department}%'
limit #{pager.offset},#{pager.limit};

select count(*) from member where 1 = 1
and member.company_id like '%${companyId}%'
and member.num like '%${num}%'
and member.name like '%${name}%'
